unlekker.mb2.util
Class UMbMk2

java.lang.Object
  unlekker.mb2.util.UMbMk2
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants, UConst
Direct Known Subclasses:
UBase, UBB, UEdge, UEdgeList, UFace, UGeo, UNav3D, UVertex, UVertexList
public class UMbMk2
extends java.lang.Object
implements UConst

UMbMk2 is the base class for most of the classes in ModelbuilderMk2, meaning that they all extend this class and thus inherit the capabilities it provides. This includes convenient tools for common computational tasks (math, string formatting etc), as well as a mechanism to set and share a PApplet instance provided by the user. Call setPApplet(PApplet) or setGraphics(PGraphics) to provide a PApplet or PGraphics instance,which can then be used by geometry classes like UGeo and UVertexList for rendering etc.

Author:
Marius Watz

Field Detail

options

public int options
Options like NODUPL, NOCOPY etc. encoded as bit flags stored as an int. Options can be toggled and checked with enable() and isEnabled()

rnd

public static URnd rnd
Static copy of unlekker.util.Rnd for easy random number generation.

rndSigned

public static float rndSigned(float v)

rndSigned

public static float rndSigned(float min,
                              float max)
Generates randomly signed integer numbers in the ranges [min..max] and [-max..-min], with equal chances of getting a negative or positve outcome. Avoids the problem of a call like random(-1,1) generating values close to zero.

Parameters:
min - Minimum absolute value
max - Maximum absolute value
Returns:
